verses.verse: And all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> after their journeys, <S%H4550><s%> according to <S%H5921><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Rephidim: <S%H7508><s%> and there was no <S%H369><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Wherefore the people <S%H5971><s%> did chide <S%H7378><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> us water <S%H4325><s%> that we may drink. <S%H8354><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Why <S%H4100><s%> chide <S%H7378><s%> ye with <S%H5978><s%> me? wherefore <S%H4100><s%> do ye tempt <S%H5254><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> thirsted <S%H6770><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> for water; <S%H4325><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that thou hast brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us and our children <S%H1121><s%> and our cattle <S%H4735><s%> with thirst? <S%H6772><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall I do <S%H6213><s%> unto this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> they be almost <S%H4592><s%> ready <S%H5750><s%> to stone <S%H5619><s%> me.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go on <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and thy rod, <S%H4294><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> thou smotest <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the river, <S%H2975><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> in thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and go. <S%H1980><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee there <S%H8033><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> in Horeb; <S%H2722><s%> and thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and there shall come <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> it, that the people <S%H5971><s%> may drink. <S%H8354><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and Meribah, <S%H4809><s%> because of <S%H5921><s%> the chiding <S%H7379><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and because <S%H5921><s%> they tempted <S%H5254><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Is <S%H3426><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us, or <S%H518><s%> not? <S%H369><s%>
Then came <S%H935><s%> Amalek, <S%H6002><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Rephidim. <S%H7508><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Choose us out <S%H977><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and go out, <S%H3318><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> with Amalek: <S%H6002><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will stand <S%H5324><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H1389><s%> with the rod <S%H4294><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in mine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to him, and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Amalek: <S%H6002><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill. <S%H1389><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> held up <S%H7311><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> that Israel <S%H3478><s%> prevailed: <S%H1396><s%> and when <S%H834><s%> he let down <S%H5117><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> prevailed. <S%H1396><s%>

But Moses' <S%H4872><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> were heavy; <S%H3515><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> a stone, <S%H68><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it under <S%H8478><s%> him, and he sat <S%H3427><s%> thereon; <S%H5921><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> stayed up <S%H8551><s%> his hands, <S%H3027><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> on the one side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the other side; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and his hands <S%H3027><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> steady <S%H530><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun. <S%H8121><s%>
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> discomfited <S%H2522><s%> <S%H853><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> and his people <S%H5971><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and rehearse <S%H7760><s%> it in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Joshua: <S%H3091><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will utterly put out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H4229><s%> <S%H853><s%> the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it Jehovah-nissi: <S%H3071><s%>

For he said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%> hath sworn <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3676><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will have war <S%H4421><s%> with Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from generation <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>
